short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: simple regex tool for development and testing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool allows to search regex with affix. The content script will search the whole HTML and highlighted the matched if possible. The search result (with captured groups) will then be sent to popup.
